pullRequest.title: Google project number removed from init completely
pullRequest.bodyText:
Also fixed unit test related to changing app id during runtime

Reset statics should not be called here, as this is not a cold start


Left commented out google project number setters for reference for now



This change is

commit.message:
Google project number removed from init completely
* Also fixed unit test related to changing app id during runtime
  * Reset statics should not be called here, as this is not a cold start
* Left commented out google project number setters for reference for now

nodes.bodyText: Can we change  oldAppId to existingAppId? I think this will make things more clear as setAppId(oldAppId); sound incorrect when reading this line
lower case S. should be saveAppId
